prompt: A liminal, gold-lit Americana Grand lobby ripples with impossible geometry; dusty trophy cases glint with miniature silver ingots just stolen as carpet-lined hallways stretch into time loops behind a quietly weeping lama while bone-white fingers reach through fractured walls and the crowned silhouette of the Skeleton King looms—realized with cinematic grain, subtle anamorphic flares, dread-rich Spielberg palette, low-angle tracking shot that races the viewer toward a beckoning elevator at frame-center.

Overlay a faint red “87%” in the elevator brass and let the Skeleton King’s burning sockets glow brighter, poised at the threshold, while the six still-missing plastic trinkets flicker like low batteries along the corridor’s multiplying horizon.

Overlay the hotel corridor with glitching terminal text: faint white “.dream_bleed” scrolling upward while the Skeleton King’s crown flickers in and out of the fluorescents, grip tightening on the nearest silver ingot.
